verses.name: Jonah 3:1
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came unto Jonah the second time, saying,

verses.name: Jonah 3:2
verses.text: Arise, go unto Nineveh, that great city, and preach unto it the preaching that I bid thee.

verses.name: Jonah 3:3
verses.text: So Jonah arose, and went unto Nineveh, according to the word of the Lord. Now Nineveh was an exceeding great city of three days’ journey.

verses.name: Jonah 3:4
verses.text: And Jonah began to enter into the city a day’s journey, and he cried, and said, Yet forty days, and Nineveh shall be overthrown.
